verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> concerning things sacrificed to idols: <S%G1494><s%> We <S%G2192><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we <S%G2192><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> knowledge. <S%G1108><s%> Knowledge <S%G1108><s%> puffs up, <S%G5448><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> love <S%G26><s%> builds up. <S%G5448><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> thinks <S%G1380><s%> that he knows <S%G1097><s%> anything, <S%G5100><s%> he doesn't <S%G3762><s%> yet <S%G3764><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> he ought <S%G1163><s%> to know. <S%G1097><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> loves <S%G25><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> the same <S%G3778><s%> is known <S%G1097><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> the eating <S%G1035><s%> of things sacrificed to idols, <S%G1494><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> no idol <S%G1497><s%> is anything <S%G3762><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> there is no <S%G3762><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> but <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> one. <S%G1520><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> though <S%G1512><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> things that are called <S%G3004><s%> "gods, <S%G2316><s%>" whether <S%G1535><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the heavens <S%G3772><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth; <S%G1093><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> "gods <S%G2316><s%>" and <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> "lords; <S%G2962><s%>"

yet <S%G235><s%> to us <S%G2254><s%> there is one <S%G1520><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> are all things, <S%G3956><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> him; <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> are all things, <S%G3956><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> live through <S%G1223><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

However, <S%G235><s%> that knowledge <S%G1108><s%> isn't <S%G1722><s%> in all men. <S%G3956><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> some, <S%G5100><s%> with consciousness <S%G4893><s%> of the idol <S%G1497><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> now, <S%G737><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> of a thing sacrificed to <S%G2193><s%> an idol, <S%G1494><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> conscience, <S%G4893><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> weak, <S%G772><s%> is defiled. <S%G3435><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> food <S%G1033><s%> will not <S%G3756><s%> commend <S%G3936><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> neither, <S%G3777><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> we don't <S%G3361><s%> eat, <S%G5315><s%> are we the worse; <S%G5302><s%> nor, <S%G3777><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> we eat, <S%G5315><s%> are we the better. <S%G4052><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> be careful <S%G991><s%> that by no means <S%G3381><s%> does this <S%G3778><s%> liberty <S%G1849><s%> of yours <S%G5216><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> a stumbling block <S%G4348><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> weak. <S%G770><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> sees <S%G1492><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> who have <S%G2192><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%> sitting <S%G2621><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> an idol <S%G1493><s%>'s temple, <S%G3618><s%> won't <S%G3780><s%> his <S%G846><s%> conscience, <S%G4893><s%> if he is <S%G5607><s%> weak, <S%G772><s%> be emboldened <S%G3618><s%> to eat <S%G2068><s%> <S%G1519><s%> things sacrificed to idols? <S%G1494><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> through <S%G1909><s%> your <S%G4674><s%> knowledge, <S%G1108><s%> <S%G622><s%> he who is weak <S%G770><s%> perishes, <S%G622><s%> the brother <S%G80><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> whose sake <S%G3739><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> died. <S%G599><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Thus, <S%G264><s%> sinning <S%G3779><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> the brothers, <S%G80><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wounding <S%G5180><s%> their <S%G846><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> when it is weak, <S%G770><s%> you sin <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Therefore, <S%G1355><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> food <S%G1033><s%> causes <S%G4624><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> to stumble, <S%G4624><s%> I will eat <S%G5315><s%> <S%G3756><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> meat <S%G2907><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forevermore, <S%G165><s%> that <S%G3361><s%> I don't <S%G4624><s%> cause my <S%G3450><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> stumble. <S%G4624><s%>
